activities:
DataCenter server hosting of websites and applications for our clients. 

DSXData is the sole owner of information collected on this site.  We only have access to information that you voluntarily give us such as: name, address, etc. DSXData does not sell or rent this information.

DSXData uses your information to respond to you relating to the reason you contacted us. We do not share your information with any third party outside of our organization.

Unless you have chosen to opt out, we may contact you via email or US Mail in the future to tell you about specials, new products, services, or changes to this privacy notice.
